text: Sore de chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudaru hi o, hitobito ni keikoku shi nasai. Sonotoki fugi no to wa iudearou. `Omo yo, mijikai kikan no o yūyo o negaimasu. Watashi-tachi wa anata no yobikake ni kotaete, shito ni shitagaimasu.'(-Nushi wa kotaete ōse rareyou). `Nani to, izen anata gata wa, suitai suru (yōna) koto wa nai noda to, chikatte itade wanai ka
